meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marybeth Meakim Sylvia Parker Brian Hindelang Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4373.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Marybeth Meakim, a seventh grade teacher from Glenside, Pennsylvania
Sylvia Parker, a freelance editor from New York, New York
Brian Hindelang, an electronics technician from San Antonio, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $30,800)

tr.td: SAINTS
MOVIE COMEDIES
THINK TWICE
TURN
"UR" HEAD
KAFKA
